About the game: 1166 is a psychological horror game following six people in Salem, Massachusetts and how their lives change when one of them is kidnappedâ€¦. Fight through pain, depression, and grotesque monsters to uncover the truth. The darkness has taken a hold, will you see the light or hide in the shadows? Or will you find another way? Will you slaughter everything in your path, or take a more passive approach? The choice is yours... Made by a one man ( and two cats ) development team, this dark mystery has simple artwork, keyboard and mouse controls, compelling multiple endings and original music. Key Features: -Thrilling adventure with a deep story that captivates from beginning to end. -Charming pixel-art graphics and a simple interface that gets out of your way. -Complex characters, each with their own personality and agenda. -Original soundtrack. -Multiple endings, each with part of the whole story. -Exciting combat that pushes you to move with caution. -Available on PC, MAC, Linux. -Occasional Pixel boob! 1166 contains strong adult themes and is recommended for player over 18.
